mapper.insert: insert into video (type, user_no, thumbnail, views, reg_datetime, update_datetime, likes, dislikes, title, description, time, video_file) values (#{type}, #{userNo}, #{thumbnail}, #{views}, now(), now(), #{likes}, #{dislikes}, #{title}, #{description}, #{time}, #{videoFile})
mapper.select: SELECT *, video_file AS videoFile FROM VIDEO
SELECT *, video_file AS videoFile FROM VIDEO where no > #{last_no} limit 5
